channel.title: Ilya Pantsyr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Ilya Pantsyr's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Ilya Pantsyr and I spend most of my time in front of the computer. I study at Chernivtsi National University (ChNU) in Ukraine, majoring in Software Engineering (2021-2025). I specialize in backend system development using Java, Kotlin and Spring as my main technologies. Contact Telegram: https://t.me/ilya_pantsyr Email: panilyau@gmail.com

item.title: Projects
item.description: Datafaker I’m collaborator on this project. Fixing bugs, improving features and trying to make library better. This library is a modern port of java-faker (also contributed to java-faker in past), built on Java 8, with up to date libraries and several newly added Fake Generators. Let’s PDF An Image(s) to PDF conversion service that allows you immediately convert .img to .pdf. Mochaccino A WebService/API that generates fake data for mocking your programs.
